name: Gamble
description:
To Heal you must get in the school to the left side of the trail within the castle,  to battle go in the right side of the trail to get into battle, There are 3 bosses and in between 2 grunts. 
In the Battle you must select a card or use one of the arrows to change to a different card.
This project was made  in a group of 4 people 
That group is:

DIGIBISCUIT
